name: Kristian Themstrup Media
tag_list: wordpress, web-design, we-development, marketing, logo-design, kristian-themstrup
overview:
In business since 2009, Kristian Themstrup Media is a leading provider of WordPress web design, development and marketing services.

Owned and operated by Kristian Themstrup and based in Seattle, Washington, Kristian Themstrup Media works with clients around the world primarily on the open-source WordPress platform, providing solutions including site setup, theme creation and customization, template development, graphic and logo design, and search engine marketing. The company specializes in Real Estate WordPress Web Design and is recognized as the premier WordPress Real Estate Web Design company online.

As an independent web studio, Kristian Themstrup Media also works with StudioPress and Brian Gardner on managing the AgentPress Real Estate WordPress Theme. Being intimate with the most popular WordPress Real Estate Theme available in the premium theme market allows Kristian Themstrup Media to operate on the leading edge of Real Estate web technology and provide clients with effective online solutions in an ever-changing market.

For further information, a portfolio of work and services available, contact Kristian Themstrup Media online through KristianThemstrup.com.

image.attribution: Kristian Themstrup / Kristian Themstrup
